title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology.
trivia: The rotating hallway scene was created without CGI.

title: The Matrix
plot: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
trivia: Neo's iconic bullet-dodging scene took 120 hours to shoot.

title: Titanic
plot: A young couple's love story unfolds on the ill-fated RMS Titanic.
trivia: The movie's budget was higher than the cost to build the original ship.

title: The Godfather
plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.
trivia: The cat in Marlon Brando's lap was a stray found on the set.

title: Interstellar
plot: A group of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
trivia: The black hole in the movie was based on real scientific equations.

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster, and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
trivia: The word 'fuck' is used 265 times in the movie.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to undermine Batman's influence and create chaos in Gotham City.
trivia: Heath Ledger kept a Joker diary to get into character.

title: Jurassic Park
plot: Dinosaurs are cloned and brought back to life to populate a theme park, but things go wrong.
trivia: The T-Rex's roars were a combination of dog, penguin, tiger, alligator, and elephant sounds.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station.
trivia: The lightsaber sound effect was created by combining the hum of an old TV picture tube and the buzz of a film projector.

title: Forrest Gump
plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with a low IQ.
trivia: The bench that Forrest sits on in the movie is now in a museum in Savannah, Georgia.

title: Fight Club
plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club.
trivia: The chemical burn scene was done with real chemicals.

title: Avatar
plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
trivia: The Na'vi language was created by a linguist specifically for the film.

title: The Avengers
plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
trivia: The 'shawarma scene' was added after the film's premiere.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
trivia: The movie was shot in a real prison in Mansfield, Ohio.

title: The Lion King
plot: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
trivia: 'Hakuna Matata' means 'no worries' in Swahili.

title: Gladiator
plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
trivia: Russell Crowe's armor weighed 33 pounds.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
plot: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family, and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.
trivia: The scenes at Hogwarts were filmed in various historic buildings in the UK.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
trivia: Over 19,000 costumes were made for the trilogy.

title: Saving Private Ryan
plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of US soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
trivia: The D-Day scenes were filmed on the Irish coast.

title: Back to the Future
plot: Marty McFly, a teenager, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, eccentric scientist Doc Brown.
trivia: The DeLorean's flux capacitor required 1.21 gigawatts of electricity to function.

title: Inidan2
plot: Inidan thatha saving inida
